question: What is the theme of 2017 International Mine Awareness Day (IMAD)?
explanation: The International Day of Mine Awareness and Assistance in Mine Action is observed every year on April 4  to raise awareness about landmines and progress toward their eradication.  The day also highlights the deadly threat that mines pose to civilians’ lives and nations’ development. The 2017 theme is “Needs driven. People Centred”.
